name: gusplease
text: The Gravity's Rainbow of Achewoods.

name: catachresis
text: If Pynchon ever left his house and read that, he'd fuck you up

name: internnumber1
text: Right, like Pynchon ever leaves his house. Or knows what a computer is.

name: qatipay
text: A comment left by qatipay was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pwb, rhino, sumisueme)

name: littlefatdog
text: just internnumber's luck that a computer-store clerk that happens to regularly serve thomas pynchon happened to be perusing these comments

name: snowman
text: Hilarious!

name: crinklebat
text: I am hoping so hard that this is true.

name: qatipay
text: it would be a really boring story for me to have invented, frankly. even as truth it's kind of lame!

name: greyfield
text: Not at all, indeed. I can only imagine the shenanigans Thomas Pynchon gets into on the internet.

name: joestork
text:
So is Lie Bot CELEBRATING the murder of Roast Beef?

Because that would be pretty damn COLD.

But then again we just saw him lying there in the costume... so was that doppelganger also a doppelganger of Lie Bot himself, who then orchestrated the entire scenario remotely?

Because that would be DOUBLE COLD.

name: baryonyx
text: Maybe he's lying about celebrating the murder of Roast Beef.

name: invidious
text: It would not at all surprise me to find out he's masquerading as Dr. Manflesh.

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ezcmac, Overmedicated, tttt, DiamondMonster, GeyserShitdick, Koremora, antecen, edgy, SoManyWhales, lk, littlefatdog, heatbag, SotiCoto)

name: wehavemagnums
text: Beat me to it.

name: daaaaang
text: I mean, I know Asherdan sucks, but there was no reason to lame this comment.  You should all be ashamed of yourselves.

name: soticoto
text:
I would give that one comment a thousand and one lames if I could... NOT because it was Asherdan... but because we seem to have some sort of a stuck record around here perpetually replaying lines from a particular early strip ad infinitum ... and it was only funny ONCE.

Just once.
And that once was when Onstad did it.


And you should be ashamed of yourself for defending Ashy doing such things.

name: dtuba
text: SHUT UP        it's still funny

name: soticoto
text:
As I said, it was only funny when Onstad did it originally.
It has not been funny since then.

name: asherdan
text:
Actually, I agree.

"Why find out" has a better application range anyways.

name: brah_angelico
text: How do you know that a robot's ass is bad?

name: asherdan
text: Seriously, dude, why find out?

name: eviltkat
text: Just some fun times with the dudes

name: natashamarie
text:
SUCCESS! Whoooo!

C'mon, this is how everyone feels when they are totally pumped. (Ass exposed or not)

name: nabeel84
text: I don't know why the robots had some grand plan to get Roast Beef killed. Real mean of them. Wouldn't have expected this of Vlad.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Dogg, they know he'll come back.  He always comes back.

name: vreeeee
text: Mama always told me I'd be killed by a robot's ass assin'.  I think that's what she said.

name: gouldgonewild
text: no. Mama told you not to come. She said...

name: plummet
text:
that aint the way to have fun


son

name: carlyle
text: Mama always told me not to look into the eye's of the sun/But mama, that's where the fun is

name: sargasm
text: So are they collectively celebrating Lie Bot's Culpepper caper?

name: aaron_haynes
text: It always seemed to me like kind of an unrelated interlude before the plot was resolved.

name: charchar
text: I figured they had been planning this particular caper a good long while.  Lie Bot considers it successful because only the presence of the real Uncle Culpepper could expose him.

name: gorrioncita
text: I always assumed that it was a success because Lie Bot made it with Tina.

name: hateandwar
text: Holy damn I never even thought of it like that. Tina got it on with a robot, that is ill.

name: pepperhittherim
text: Ha ha! WHOOO!

name: whuppins
text:
Haha, SUCCESS!

Even Andy's there.

name: serf
text: andy is such an enigma. id like to see more of him.

name: mattfish
text: You're already seeing his ass

name: mangtastic
text:
That is actually Lie-Bot's ass.

Andy is the rectangle dude, all lookin like the monolith from 2001 a space odyssey.

name: mangtastic
text: Oh shit!  Feel free to lame that comment.  I Totally did not see his weird tiny  buttcrack.  I see the error of my ways.  I chubby mattfish to atone for my sins.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i do not know you, yet feel we will become friends, due to your avatar. do not prove me wrong.

name: dougthehead
text: Okay, the robots have been celebrating for about a week now...

name: centipede_damascus
text: It's easy when you're a robot and don't get tired.

name: taiiga
text: WHY FIND OUT?

name: cthulhu235
text: This strip is so awesome, that it took the preceding one just to get warmed up.

name: drycup
text:
Have you ever met a lady friend who had a behind like Andy's?

I have.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Oh damn, I've read this strip dozens of times but, somehow, I'd always missed that Andy DOES have an ass.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Try to think of any other context where you'd say "Oh damn, he DOES have an ass."

Go on. Try.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
I'm at a loss.

But a friend of mine was once at a political rally/free concert a few years back with his girlfriend. Still, that didn't keep his eye from wondering a bit, and it eventually made its way to the stage between acts. He saw a fine, fine ass, as he described it, in the tight jeans of someone bending over to fiddle with an amp or something. He kept his on this ass for several seconds, until the rest of this body upped and turned around. It was Jon Bon Jovi.

Still, he doesn't deny it. To this day, he'll always admit that JBJ has a fine ass.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Good lord . Ewwwwww.

(Not "ewww" at homosexual possibilities, "ewww" at Bon Jovi's ass.)

name: tellumo
text: BOO TO THAT

name: snowman
text:
haha "homosexual possibilities"

for some reason this reminds me of "secret dachsund ideas."

name: snowman
text: That is an awesome story.

name: laserblade
text: This deserves more chubbies.  This is amazing.  THE ASS WAS JON BON JOVI'S

name: notcool
text:
Fire, Police, and EMT all talkin', not going out of their way to move quickly anymore.

Happens more than you think.

name: spinynorman
text:
Andy has white boy ass.

<--- White boy.

name: shoinan
text:
What song are you hearing when you read this strip?

I hear Steppenwolf's Margic Carpet Ride.

name: stuart
text: I hear a different Steppenwolf song, a certain song about wildness and birth that normally accompanies being with dudes in a truck.

name: shoinan
text: Ah, I presume you're referring to Birth Wildness, the B-side to Magic Carpet Ride

name: gouldgonewild
text: Kick ass, dude

name: cinderfella
text: I hear 'Europe' The Final Countdown. Also, lie-bot is a robot. He can't make stew, so even his ass is a lie. Stone.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Naw. Born in the U.S.A. Them's just good ole' bots.

name: pepperhittherim
text: Does anyone else imagine Lie Bot making sounds such as a squeaky mattress makes in that last panel when he is wiggling his robot butt?

name: jordstar
text:
My mind is getting blown! Look at Andy's square little robot asscrack in panel five!

To this day I thought Lie Bot's was the only robot ass we'd ever seen.

name: boscostacy
text: It is a shame that no cameras are recording them as they harass a community in their car. That would make it a truly rad day.

name: pez
text: does anyone else get the idea that they are driving around waving their moons in the middle of the night when there is nobody awake to moon?

name: bixschmix
text: I'm sorry, I didn't hear you. I was busy staring distractedly at your avatar.

name: jonnay
text: Damn, they did it more  This certainly qualifies them to be in the running for being the new dirtiest dudes in town.

name: dasuta
text: Robot buttocks baffle the mind.

name: aperson
text: They're more efficient. Get used to it.

name: mattylite
text: ROBOT ASS! FUCKIN' ROBOT ASS, PEOPLE, ROBOT ASS!!!

name: i_love_kate
text: I'm going to say a big ole' "no" to fucking robot ass.

name: unsentletter
text:
Oh, god; I love this strip so much.

The pacing, the wanton silliness, the Success. So great. Thanks, Onstad.

name: butta
text: How this and the previous strip are rated under 5, I will never know.

name: alaric101
text: Robots have no inhibitions. This much is clear. Maybe LieBot is a recycled still and the residues from years of cooking moonshine inside make him a total dickhead.

name: radarjammer
text: BOO TO THAT.

name: carlyle
text: COME ON MAN I WAS GONNA SAY THAT

name: soticoto
text:
You're gonna say it anyway.
Everyone seems to be saying it these days.
Seems folks can't go more than about 5 minutes without saying it.
So why not just let it out while you can?


... Y'know... I rated this strip a 5, but that is on the condition that I separate it from the mass of people endlessly repeating "BOO TO THAT" and other such related remarks all the way down the motherfucking page.

name: carlyle
text: Yeah, boo to that, man.

name: soticoto
text: I saw that coming a mile off.

name: carlyle
text: Okay, good. I'd hate to startle you or something.

name: soticoto
text: Aye. That could make me spill my booze... and wasting booze is never a good thing.

name: carlyle
text: Is the booze why you've replied to like a dozen of my posts?

name: carlyle
text: (i was going to make a job about my inbox not seeing this much activity since I tried to screw a website and my dick went to the wrong URL, but I'm tired and am sure I'd regret making such an awful joke in the morning.)

name: carlyle
text: (Christ. *joke)

name: soticoto
text: Nah. Boredom.

name: uforgotpoland
text: YEAH!!!

name: tonyhighwind
text: Success!

name: scorpio_nadir
text: I hear the intro of a song by Golden Earring Radar Love as the soundtrack to this strip.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Chucklebot is pretty entertained.

You can probably guess why.

name: aperson
text: Is it because his mouth is a rigid, smile-shaped metal aperture?

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Oh...I thought it was because of all the robot dude ass flying about.

But, yeah, you might have a point.


Or could it be that he finally killed his girlfriend?

name: aperson
text:
He is Chucklebot - I suppose he's always pleased by definition.

I only just recently noticed (maybe I noticed and then forgot) that in these Robot Ass/Datsun strips Lie-Bot is probably celebrating his hugely successful Culpepper lie here.

name: treatyofparis
text: Chris: for two days in a row you are using robots being "back in town" and for this i am ever grateful. Way to rock the mother out.

name: vulpes-aurum
text: More like SuccASS.CB
